name: The Sketch!
description:
You're a Sketch (Made by Someone)

And You're In their Locker!

You're trying to get Out of the school.

Arrow Keys to move, Right click to Sprint and.. Click to shoot Letters! :]

Step 1 : Get the Pencils.

Step 2 : Get out of The Book.

Step 3 : Get out of The School

(Sound will be Added Later)! :D

-Somehow I still didn't Pass 50 total Events- ._.

And yeah... Theres no Lore :3
